response: Mikey Chen is currently the CEO at Think Foundation, a non-profit organization focused on innovative thinking. You've had a few interactions with him recently, noting that he's quite active in his role. If you want to connect with him further, you can find him on LinkedIn under the handle @mikeychen. It seems like you've had some positive encounters, so maybe reaching out on LinkedIn could be a good next step!
